name: The Well (SelkieHarbour)
description:
The Well is our first experiment: a short narrative game about fate and consequences.

The seer has revealed a prophecy that that will cause a civil war. It is in these moments of despair when the villagers dare to talk to the spirit that breathes under the well.

Credits:
Game by: @SelkieHarbour
Music by: @derekdoesmusic

Note: Currently only available in Windows.
